markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Tendril Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=770) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Eidolon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=386" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 65 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

Stretching to extend its body to its limits, your eidolon attacks a foe that would normally be beyond its reach.  Your eidolon makes a melee [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) Strike, increasing its [reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192) by 5 feet for that Strike. If the unarmed attack has the [disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41), [shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38), or [trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) trait, the eidolon can use the corresponding action instead of a Strike.
name: Tendril Strike
